author: Cedric Canard
content: I haven't played with the E-M1 but it looks better to hold than its predecessor and the kit lens, while seemingly bulky, actually looks like a rather nice lens and seem to deliver where it counts. I can't tell you what you should do but I can tell you that I like this photo. The foreground textures and muted colours are beautiful and the scene almost looks surreal, like a composite of two images.
